00081 /* extra padding for lengths (to go under scrollers) */
00082 #define EXTRA_SCROLL_PAD    100.0f
00083 
00084 /* size of indent steps */
00085 #define INDENT_STEP_SIZE    7
00086 
00087 #define ANIM_CHAN_NAME_SIZE 256
00088 
00089 /* macros used for type defines */
00090 
00091 /* get the pointer used for some flag and return */
00092 #define GET_ACF_FLAG_PTR(ptr, type) ((*(type) = sizeof((ptr))), &(ptr))

00098 /* Draw Backdrop ---------------------------------- */

00100 /* get backdrop color for top-level widgets (Scene and Object only) */
00101 static void acf_generic_root_color(bAnimContext *UNUSED(ac), bAnimListElem *UNUSED(ale), float *color)
00102 {
00103     /* darker blue for top-level widgets */
00104     UI_GetThemeColor3fv(TH_DOPESHEET_CHANNELOB, color);
00105 }
00106 
00107 /* backdrop for top-level widgets (Scene and Object only) */
00108 static void acf_generic_root_backdrop(bAnimContext *ac, bAnimListElem *ale, float yminc, float ymaxc)
00109 {
00110     bAnimChannelType *acf= ANIM_channel_get_typeinfo(ale);
00111     View2D *v2d= &ac->ar->v2d;
00112     short expanded= ANIM_channel_setting_get(ac, ale, ACHANNEL_SETTING_EXPAND) != 0;
00113     short offset= (acf->get_offset) ? acf->get_offset(ac, ale) : 0;
00114     float color[3];
00115     
00116     /* set backdrop drawing color */
00117     acf->get_backdrop_color(ac, ale, color);
00118     glColor3fv(color);
00119     
00120     /* rounded corners on LHS only - top only when expanded, but bottom too when collapsed */
00121     uiSetRoundBox(expanded ? UI_CNR_TOP_LEFT : (UI_CNR_TOP_LEFT | UI_CNR_BOTTOM_LEFT));
00122     uiDrawBox(GL_POLYGON, offset,  yminc, v2d->cur.xmax+EXTRA_SCROLL_PAD, ymaxc, 8);
00123 }
00124

00126 /* get backdrop color for data expanders under top-level Scene/Object */
00127 static void acf_generic_dataexpand_color(bAnimContext *UNUSED(ac), bAnimListElem *UNUSED(ale), float *color)
00128 {
00129     /* lighter color than top-level widget */
00130     UI_GetThemeColor3fv(TH_DOPESHEET_CHANNELSUBOB, color);
00131 }

00133 /* backdrop for data expanders under top-level Scene/Object */
00134 static void acf_generic_dataexpand_backdrop(bAnimContext *ac, bAnimListElem *ale, float yminc, float ymaxc)
00135 {
00136     bAnimChannelType *acf= ANIM_channel_get_typeinfo(ale);
00137     View2D *v2d= &ac->ar->v2d;
00138     short offset= (acf->get_offset) ? acf->get_offset(ac, ale) : 0;
00139     float color[3];
00140     
00141     /* set backdrop drawing color */
00142     acf->get_backdrop_color(ac, ale, color);
00143     glColor3fv(color);
00144     
00145     /* no rounded corner - just rectangular box */
00146     glRectf(offset, yminc,  v2d->cur.xmax+EXTRA_SCROLL_PAD, ymaxc);
00147 }
00148 
00149 /* get backdrop color for generic channels */
00150 static void acf_generic_channel_color(bAnimContext *ac, bAnimListElem *ale, float *color)
00151 {
00152     bAnimChannelType *acf= ANIM_channel_get_typeinfo(ale);
00153     SpaceAction *saction = NULL;
00154     bActionGroup *grp = NULL;
00155     short indent= (acf->get_indent_level) ? acf->get_indent_level(ac, ale) : 0;
00156     
00157     /* get context info needed... */
00158     if ((ac->sl) && (ac->spacetype == SPACE_ACTION))
00159         saction= (SpaceAction *)ac->sl;
00160         
00161     if (ale->type == ANIMTYPE_FCURVE) {
00162         FCurve *fcu= (FCurve *)ale->data;
00163         grp= fcu->grp;
00164     }
00165     
00166     /* set color for normal channels 
00167      *  - use 3 shades of color group/standard color for 3 indention level
00168      *  - only use group colors if allowed to, and if actually feasible
00169      */
00170     if ( (saction && !(saction->flag & SACTION_NODRAWGCOLORS)) && 
00171          ((grp) && (grp->customCol)) ) 
00172     {
00173         unsigned char cp[3];
00174         
00175         if (indent == 2) {
00176             copy_v3_v3_char((char *)cp, grp->cs.solid);
00177         }
00178         else if (indent == 1) {
00179             copy_v3_v3_char((char *)cp, grp->cs.select);
00180         }
00181         else {
00182             copy_v3_v3_char((char *)cp, grp->cs.active);
00183         }
00184         
00185         /* copy the colors over, transforming from bytes to floats */
00186         rgb_uchar_to_float(color, cp);
00187     }
00188     else {
00189         // FIXME: what happens when the indention is 1 greater than what it should be (due to grouping)?
00190         int colOfs= 20 - 20*indent;
00191         UI_GetThemeColorShade3fv(TH_HEADER, colOfs, color);
00192     }
00193 }
00194 
00195 /* backdrop for generic channels */
00196 static void acf_generic_channel_backdrop(bAnimContext *ac, bAnimListElem *ale, float yminc, float ymaxc)
00197 {
00198     bAnimChannelType *acf= ANIM_channel_get_typeinfo(ale);
00199     View2D *v2d= &ac->ar->v2d;
00200     short offset= (acf->get_offset) ? acf->get_offset(ac, ale) : 0;
00201     float color[3];
00202     
00203     /* set backdrop drawing color */
00204     acf->get_backdrop_color(ac, ale, color);
00205     glColor3fv(color);
00206     
00207     /* no rounded corners - just rectangular box */
00208     glRectf(offset, yminc,  v2d->cur.xmax+EXTRA_SCROLL_PAD, ymaxc);
00209 }

00213 /* indention level is always the value in the name */
00214 static short acf_generic_indention_0(bAnimContext *UNUSED(ac), bAnimListElem *UNUSED(ale))
00215 {
00216     return 0;
00217 }
00218 static short acf_generic_indention_1(bAnimContext *UNUSED(ac), bAnimListElem *UNUSED(ale))
00219 {
00220     return 1;
00221 }
00222 #if 0 // XXX not used
00223 static short acf_generic_indention_2(bAnimContext *ac, bAnimListElem *ale)
00224 {
00225     return 2;
00226 }

00229 /* indention which varies with the grouping status */
00230 static short acf_generic_indention_flexible(bAnimContext *UNUSED(ac), bAnimListElem *ale)
00231 {
00232     short indent= 0;
00233     
00234     /* grouped F-Curves need extra level of indention */
00235     if (ale->type == ANIMTYPE_FCURVE) {
00236         FCurve *fcu= (FCurve *)ale->data;
00237         
00238         // TODO: we need some way of specifying that the indention color should be one less...
00239         if (fcu->grp)
00240             indent++;
00241     }
00242     
00243     /* no indention */
00244     return indent;
00245 }
00246 
00247 /* basic offset for channels derived from indention */
00248 static short acf_generic_basic_offset(bAnimContext *ac, bAnimListElem *ale)
00249 {
00250     bAnimChannelType *acf= ANIM_channel_get_typeinfo(ale);
00251     
00252     if (acf && acf->get_indent_level)
00253         return acf->get_indent_level(ac, ale) * INDENT_STEP_SIZE;
00254     else
00255         return 0;
00256 }
00257 
00258 /* offset based on nodetree type */
00259 static short acf_nodetree_rootType_offset(bNodeTree *ntree)
00260 {
00261     if (ntree) {
00262         switch (ntree->type) {
00263             case NTREE_SHADER:
00264                 /* 1 additional level (i.e. is indented one level in from material, 
00265                  * so shift all right by one step) 
00266                  */
00267                 return INDENT_STEP_SIZE; 
00268                 
00269             case NTREE_COMPOSIT:
00270                 /* no additional levels needed */
00271                 return 0; 
00272                 
00273             case NTREE_TEXTURE:
00274                 /* 2 additional levels */
00275                 return INDENT_STEP_SIZE*2; 
00276         }
00277     }
00278     
00279     // unknown
00280     return 0;
00281 }
00282 
00283 /* offset for groups + grouped entities */
00284 static short acf_generic_group_offset(bAnimContext *ac, bAnimListElem *ale)
00285 {
00286     short offset= acf_generic_basic_offset(ac, ale);
00287     
00288     if (ale->id) {
00289         /* texture animdata */
00290         if (GS(ale->id->name) == ID_TE) {
00291             offset += 21;
00292         }
00293         /* materials and particles animdata */
00294         else if (ELEM(GS(ale->id->name),ID_MA,ID_PA)) 
00295             offset += 14;
00296             
00297         /* if not in Action Editor mode, action-groups (and their children) must carry some offset too... */
00298         else if (ac->datatype != ANIMCONT_ACTION)
00299             offset += 14;
00300             
00301         /* nodetree animdata */
00302         if (GS(ale->id->name) == ID_NT) {
00303             offset += acf_nodetree_rootType_offset((bNodeTree*)ale->id);
00304         }
00305     }
00306     
00307     /* offset is just the normal type - i.e. based on indention */
00308     return offset;
00309 }

00313 /* name for ID block entries */
00314 static void acf_generic_idblock_name(bAnimListElem *ale, char *name)
00315 {
00316     ID *id= (ID *)ale->data;    /* data pointed to should be an ID block */
00317     
00318     /* just copy the name... */
00319     if (id && name)
00320         BLI_strncpy(name, id->name+2, ANIM_CHAN_NAME_SIZE);
00321 }
00322 
00323 /* name property for ID block entries */
00324 static short acf_generic_idblock_nameprop(bAnimListElem *ale, PointerRNA *ptr, PropertyRNA **prop)
00325 {
00326     RNA_id_pointer_create(ale->id, ptr);
00327     *prop = RNA_struct_name_property(ptr->type);
00328     
00329     return (*prop != NULL);
00330 }
00331 
00332 
00333 /* name property for ID block entries which are just subheading "fillers" */
00334 static short acf_generic_idfill_nameprop(bAnimListElem *ale, PointerRNA *ptr, PropertyRNA **prop)
00335 {
00336     /* actual ID we're representing is stored in ale->data not ale->id, as id gives the owner */
00337     RNA_id_pointer_create(ale->data, ptr);
00338     *prop = RNA_struct_name_property(ptr->type);
00339     
00340     return (*prop != NULL);
00341 }

00353 /* check if some setting exists for this object-based data-expander (datablock only) */
00354 static short acf_generic_dataexpand_setting_valid(bAnimContext *ac, bAnimListElem *UNUSED(ale), int setting)
00355 {
00356     switch (setting) {
00357         /* expand is always supported */
00358         case ACHANNEL_SETTING_EXPAND:
00359             return 1;
00360             
00361         /* mute is only supported for NLA */
00362         case ACHANNEL_SETTING_MUTE:
00363             return ((ac) && (ac->spacetype == SPACE_NLA));
00364             
00365         /* other flags are never supported */
00366         default:
00367             return 0;
00368     }
00369 }

00374 /* Animation Summary ----------------------------------- */
00375 
00376 /* get backdrop color for summary widget */
00377 static void acf_summary_color(bAnimContext *UNUSED(ac), bAnimListElem *UNUSED(ale), float *color)
00378 {
00379     // FIXME: hardcoded color - same as the 'action' line in NLA
00380         // reddish color 
00381     color[0] = 0.8f;
00382     color[1] = 0.2f;
00383     color[2] = 0.0f;
00384 }
00385 
00386 /* backdrop for summary widget */
00387 static void acf_summary_backdrop(bAnimContext *ac, bAnimListElem *ale, float yminc, float ymaxc)
00388 {
00389     bAnimChannelType *acf= ANIM_channel_get_typeinfo(ale);
00390     View2D *v2d= &ac->ar->v2d;
00391     float color[3];
00392     
00393     /* set backdrop drawing color */
00394     acf->get_backdrop_color(ac, ale, color);
00395     glColor3fv(color);
00396     
00397     /* rounded corners on LHS only 
00398      *  - top and bottom 
00399      *  - special hack: make the top a bit higher, since we are first... 
00400      */
00401     uiSetRoundBox(UI_CNR_TOP_LEFT | UI_CNR_BOTTOM_LEFT);
00402     uiDrawBox(GL_POLYGON, 0,  yminc-2, v2d->cur.xmax+EXTRA_SCROLL_PAD, ymaxc, 8);
00403 }

00405 /* name for summary entries */

00407 {
00408     if (name)
00409         BLI_strncpy(name, "DopeSheet Summary", ANIM_CHAN_NAME_SIZE);
00410 }

00418 /* check if some setting exists for this channel */
00419 static short acf_summary_setting_valid(bAnimContext *UNUSED(ac), bAnimListElem *UNUSED(ale), int setting)
00420 {
00421     /* only expanded is supported, as it is used for hiding all stuff which the summary covers */
00422     return (setting == ACHANNEL_SETTING_EXPAND);
00423 }
00424 
00425 /* get the appropriate flag(s) for the setting when it is valid  */
00426 static int acf_summary_setting_flag(bAnimContext *UNUSED(ac), int setting, short *neg)
00427 {
00428     if (setting == ACHANNEL_SETTING_EXPAND) {
00429         /* expanded */
00430         *neg= 1;
00431         return ADS_FLAG_SUMMARY_COLLAPSED;
00432     }
00433     else {
00434         /* unsupported */
00435         *neg= 0;
00436         return 0;
00437     }
00438 }
00439 
00440 /* get pointer to the setting */
00441 static void *acf_summary_setting_ptr(bAnimListElem *ale, int setting, short *type)
00442 {
00443     bAnimContext *ac= (bAnimContext *)ale->data;
00444     
00445     /* if data is valid, return pointer to active dopesheet's relevant flag 
00446      *  - this is restricted to DopeSheet/Action Editor only
00447      */
00448     if ((ac->sl) && (ac->spacetype == SPACE_ACTION) && (setting == ACHANNEL_SETTING_EXPAND)) {
00449         SpaceAction *saction= (SpaceAction *)ac->sl;
00450         bDopeSheet *ads= &saction->ads;
00451         
00452         /* return pointer to DopeSheet's flag */
00453         return GET_ACF_FLAG_PTR(ads->flag, type);
00454     }
00455     else {
00456         /* can't return anything useful - unsupported */
00457         *type= 0;
00458         return NULL;
00459     }
00460 }

00489 /* check if some setting exists for this channel */
00490 static short acf_scene_setting_valid(bAnimContext *ac, bAnimListElem *UNUSED(ale), int setting)
00491 {
00492     switch (setting) {
00493         /* muted only in NLA */
00494         case ACHANNEL_SETTING_MUTE: 
00495             return ((ac) && (ac->spacetype == SPACE_NLA));
00496             
00497         /* visible only in Graph Editor */
00498         case ACHANNEL_SETTING_VISIBLE: 
00499             return ((ac) && (ac->spacetype == SPACE_IPO));
00500         
00501         /* only select and expand supported otherwise */
00502         case ACHANNEL_SETTING_SELECT:
00503         case ACHANNEL_SETTING_EXPAND:
00504             return 1;
00505             
00506         default:
00507             return 0;
00508     }
00509 }
00510 
00511 /* get the appropriate flag(s) for the setting when it is valid  */
00512 static int acf_scene_setting_flag(bAnimContext *UNUSED(ac), int setting, short *neg)
00513 {
00514     /* clear extra return data first */
00515     *neg= 0;
00516     
00517     switch (setting) {
00518         case ACHANNEL_SETTING_SELECT: /* selected */
00519             return SCE_DS_SELECTED;
00520             
00521         case ACHANNEL_SETTING_EXPAND: /* expanded */
00522             *neg= 1;
00523             return SCE_DS_COLLAPSED;
00524             
00525         case ACHANNEL_SETTING_MUTE: /* mute (only in NLA) */
00526             return ADT_NLA_EVAL_OFF;
00527             
00528         case ACHANNEL_SETTING_VISIBLE: /* visible (only in Graph Editor) */
00529             *neg= 1;
00530             return ADT_CURVES_NOT_VISIBLE;
00531             
00532         default: /* unsupported */
00533             return 0;
00534     }
00535 }
00536 
00537 /* get pointer to the setting */
00538 static void *acf_scene_setting_ptr(bAnimListElem *ale, int setting, short *type)
00539 {
00540     Scene *scene= (Scene *)ale->data;
00541     
00542     /* clear extra return data first */
00543     *type= 0;
00544     
00545     switch (setting) {
00546         case ACHANNEL_SETTING_SELECT: /* selected */
00547             return GET_ACF_FLAG_PTR(scene->flag, type);
00548             
00549         case ACHANNEL_SETTING_EXPAND: /* expanded */
00550             return GET_ACF_FLAG_PTR(scene->flag, type);
00551             
00552         case ACHANNEL_SETTING_MUTE: /* mute (only in NLA) */
00553         case ACHANNEL_SETTING_VISIBLE: /* visible (for Graph Editor only) */
00554             if (scene->adt)
00555                 return GET_ACF_FLAG_PTR(scene->adt->flag, type);
00556             else
00557                 return NULL;
00558             
00559         default: /* unsupported */
00560             return NULL;
00561     }
00562 }

00583 /* Object ------------------------------------------- */
00584 
00585 static int acf_object_icon(bAnimListElem *ale)
00586 {
00587     Base *base= (Base *)ale->data;
00588     Object *ob= base->object;
00589     
00590     /* icon depends on object-type */
00591 
00592     switch (ob->type) {
00593         case OB_LAMP:
00594             return ICON_OUTLINER_OB_LAMP;
00595         case OB_MESH: 
00596             return ICON_OUTLINER_OB_MESH;
00597         case OB_CAMERA: 
00598             return ICON_OUTLINER_OB_CAMERA;
00599         case OB_CURVE: 
00600             return ICON_OUTLINER_OB_CURVE;
00601         case OB_MBALL: 
00602             return ICON_OUTLINER_OB_META;
00603         case OB_LATTICE: 
00604             return ICON_OUTLINER_OB_LATTICE;
00605         case OB_SPEAKER:
00606             return ICON_OUTLINER_OB_SPEAKER;
00607         case OB_ARMATURE:
00608             return ICON_OUTLINER_OB_ARMATURE;
00609         case OB_FONT: 
00610             return ICON_OUTLINER_OB_FONT;
00611         case OB_SURF: 
00612             return ICON_OUTLINER_OB_SURFACE;
00613         case OB_EMPTY: 
00614             return ICON_OUTLINER_OB_EMPTY;
00615         default:
00616             return ICON_OBJECT_DATA;
00617     }
00618     
00619 }

00621 /* name for object */
00622 static void acf_object_name(bAnimListElem *ale, char *name)
00623 {
00624     Base *base= (Base *)ale->data;
00625     Object *ob= base->object;
00626     
00627     /* just copy the name... */
00628     if (ob && name)
00629         BLI_strncpy(name, ob->id.name+2, ANIM_CHAN_NAME_SIZE);
00630 }
00631 
00632 /* check if some setting exists for this channel */
00633 static short acf_object_setting_valid(bAnimContext *ac, bAnimListElem *ale, int setting)
00634 {
00635     Base *base= (Base *)ale->data;
00636     Object *ob= base->object;
00637     
00638     switch (setting) {
00639         /* muted only in NLA */
00640         case ACHANNEL_SETTING_MUTE: 
00641             return ((ac) && (ac->spacetype == SPACE_NLA));
00642             
00643         /* visible only in Graph Editor */
00644         case ACHANNEL_SETTING_VISIBLE: 
00645             return ((ac) && (ac->spacetype == SPACE_IPO) && (ob->adt));
00646         
00647         /* only select and expand supported otherwise */
00648         case ACHANNEL_SETTING_SELECT:
00649         case ACHANNEL_SETTING_EXPAND:
00650             return 1;
00651             
00652         default:
00653             return 0;
00654     }
00655 }
00656 
00657 /* get the appropriate flag(s) for the setting when it is valid  */
00658 static int acf_object_setting_flag(bAnimContext *UNUSED(ac), int setting, short *neg)
00659 {
00660     /* clear extra return data first */
00661     *neg= 0;
00662     
00663     switch (setting) {
00664         case ACHANNEL_SETTING_SELECT: /* selected */
00665             return SELECT;
00666             
00667         case ACHANNEL_SETTING_EXPAND: /* expanded */
00668             *neg= 1;
00669             return OB_ADS_COLLAPSED;
00670             
00671         case ACHANNEL_SETTING_MUTE: /* mute (only in NLA) */
00672             return ADT_NLA_EVAL_OFF;
00673             
00674         case ACHANNEL_SETTING_VISIBLE: /* visible (only in Graph Editor) */
00675             *neg= 1;
00676             return ADT_CURVES_NOT_VISIBLE;
00677             
00678         default: /* unsupported */
00679             return 0;
00680     }
00681 }
00682 
00683 /* get pointer to the setting */
00684 static void *acf_object_setting_ptr(bAnimListElem *ale, int setting, short *type)
00685 {
00686     Base *base= (Base *)ale->data;
00687     Object *ob= base->object;
00688     
00689     /* clear extra return data first */
00690     *type= 0;
00691     
00692     switch (setting) {
00693         case ACHANNEL_SETTING_SELECT: /* selected */
00694             return GET_ACF_FLAG_PTR(ob->flag, type);
00695             
00696         case ACHANNEL_SETTING_EXPAND: /* expanded */
00697             return GET_ACF_FLAG_PTR(ob->nlaflag, type); // xxx
00698             
00699         case ACHANNEL_SETTING_MUTE: /* mute (only in NLA) */
00700         case ACHANNEL_SETTING_VISIBLE: /* visible (for Graph Editor only) */
00701             if (ob->adt)
00702                 return GET_ACF_FLAG_PTR(ob->adt->flag, type);
00703             else
00704                 return NULL;
00705             
00706         default: /* unsupported */
00707             return NULL;
00708     }
00709 }
00710 
00711 /* object type define */
00712 static bAnimChannelType ACF_OBJECT = 
00713 {
00714     "Object",                       /* type name */
00715     
00716     acf_generic_root_color,         /* backdrop color */
00717     acf_generic_root_backdrop,      /* backdrop */
00718     acf_generic_indention_0,        /* indent level */
00719     NULL,                           /* offset */
00720     
00721     acf_object_name,                /* name */
00722     acf_generic_idblock_nameprop,   /* name prop */
00723     acf_object_icon,                /* icon */
00724     
00725     acf_object_setting_valid,       /* has setting */
00726     acf_object_setting_flag,        /* flag for setting */
00727     acf_object_setting_ptr          /* pointer for setting */
00728 };
00729 
00730 /* Group ------------------------------------------- */
00731 
00732 /* get backdrop color for group widget */
00733 static void acf_group_color(bAnimContext *UNUSED(ac), bAnimListElem *ale, float *color)
00734 {
00735     /* highlight only for action group channels */
00736     if (ale->flag & AGRP_ACTIVE)
00737         UI_GetThemeColorShade3fv(TH_GROUP_ACTIVE, 10, color);
00738     else
00739         UI_GetThemeColorShade3fv(TH_GROUP, 20, color);
00740 }
00741 
00742 /* backdrop for group widget */
00743 static void acf_group_backdrop(bAnimContext *ac, bAnimListElem *ale, float yminc, float ymaxc)
00744 {
00745     bAnimChannelType *acf= ANIM_channel_get_typeinfo(ale);
00746     View2D *v2d= &ac->ar->v2d;
00747     short expanded= ANIM_channel_setting_get(ac, ale, ACHANNEL_SETTING_EXPAND) != 0;
00748     short offset= (acf->get_offset) ? acf->get_offset(ac, ale) : 0;
00749     float color[3];
00750     
00751     /* set backdrop drawing color */
00752     acf->get_backdrop_color(ac, ale, color);
00753     glColor3fv(color);
00754     
00755     /* rounded corners on LHS only - top only when expanded, but bottom too when collapsed */
00756     uiSetRoundBox(expanded ? UI_CNR_TOP_LEFT : (UI_CNR_TOP_LEFT | UI_CNR_BOTTOM_LEFT));
00757     uiDrawBox(GL_POLYGON, offset,  yminc, v2d->cur.xmax+EXTRA_SCROLL_PAD, ymaxc, 8);
00758 }
00759 
00760 /* name for group entries */
00761 static void acf_group_name(bAnimListElem *ale, char *name)
00762 {
00763     bActionGroup *agrp= (bActionGroup *)ale->data;
00764     
00765     /* just copy the name... */
00766     if (agrp && name)
00767         BLI_strncpy(name, agrp->name, ANIM_CHAN_NAME_SIZE);
00768 }
00769 
00770 /* name property for group entries */
00771 static short acf_group_name_prop(bAnimListElem *ale, PointerRNA *ptr, PropertyRNA **prop)
00772 {
00773     RNA_pointer_create(ale->id, &RNA_ActionGroup, ale->data, ptr);
00774     *prop = RNA_struct_name_property(ptr->type);
00775     
00776     return (*prop != NULL);
00777 }
00778 
00779 /* check if some setting exists for this channel */
00780 static short acf_group_setting_valid(bAnimContext *ac, bAnimListElem *UNUSED(ale), int setting)
00781 {
00782     /* for now, all settings are supported, though some are only conditionally */
00783     switch (setting) {
00784         case ACHANNEL_SETTING_VISIBLE: /* Only available in Graph Editor */
00785             return (ac->spacetype==SPACE_IPO);
00786             
00787         default: /* always supported */
00788             return 1;
00789     }
00790 }
00791 
00792 /* get the appropriate flag(s) for the setting when it is valid  */
00793 static int acf_group_setting_flag(bAnimContext *ac, int setting, short *neg)
00794 {
00795     /* clear extra return data first */
00796     *neg= 0;
00797     
00798     switch (setting) {
00799         case ACHANNEL_SETTING_SELECT: /* selected */
00800             return AGRP_SELECTED;
00801             
00802         case ACHANNEL_SETTING_EXPAND: /* expanded */
00803         {
00804             /* NOTE: Graph Editor uses a different flag to everywhere else for this,
00805              * allowing different collapsing of groups there, since sharing the flag
00806              * proved to be a hazard for workflows...
00807              */
00808             return (ac->spacetype == SPACE_IPO) ? 
00809                         AGRP_EXPANDED_G :   /* Graph Editor case */
00810                         AGRP_EXPANDED;      /* DopeSheet and elsewhere */
00811         }
00812             
00813         case ACHANNEL_SETTING_MUTE: /* muted */
00814             return AGRP_MUTED;
00815             
00816         case ACHANNEL_SETTING_PROTECT: /* protected */
00817             // *neg= 1; - if we change this to edtiability
00818             return AGRP_PROTECTED;
00819             
00820         case ACHANNEL_SETTING_VISIBLE: /* visiblity - graph editor */
00821             *neg= 1;
00822             return AGRP_NOTVISIBLE;
00823     }
00824     
00825     /* this shouldn't happen */
00826     return 0;
00827 }
00828 
00829 /* get pointer to the setting */
00830 static void *acf_group_setting_ptr(bAnimListElem *ale, int UNUSED(setting), short *type)
00831 {
00832     bActionGroup *agrp= (bActionGroup *)ale->data;
00833     
00834     /* all flags are just in agrp->flag for now... */
00835     return GET_ACF_FLAG_PTR(agrp->flag, type);
00836 }
00837 
00838 /* group type define */
00839 static bAnimChannelType ACF_GROUP = 
00840 {
00841     "Group",                        /* type name */
00842     
00843     acf_group_color,                /* backdrop color */
00844     acf_group_backdrop,             /* backdrop */
00845     acf_generic_indention_0,        /* indent level */
00846     acf_generic_group_offset,       /* offset */
00847     
00848     acf_group_name,                 /* name */
00849     acf_group_name_prop,            /* name prop */
00850     NULL,                           /* icon */
00851     
00852     acf_group_setting_valid,        /* has setting */
00853     acf_group_setting_flag,         /* flag for setting */
00854     acf_group_setting_ptr           /* pointer for setting */
00855 };

00857 /* F-Curve ------------------------------------------- */
00858 
00859 /* name for fcurve entries */
00860 static void acf_fcurve_name(bAnimListElem *ale, char *name)
00861 {
00862     getname_anim_fcurve(name, ale->id, ale->data);
00863 }
00864 
00865 /* check if some setting exists for this channel */
00866 static short acf_fcurve_setting_valid(bAnimContext *ac, bAnimListElem *ale, int setting)
00867 {
00868     FCurve *fcu= (FCurve *)ale->data;
00869     
00870     switch (setting) {
00871         /* unsupported */
00872         case ACHANNEL_SETTING_EXPAND: /* F-Curves are not containers */
00873             return 0;
00874         
00875         /* conditionally available */
00876         case ACHANNEL_SETTING_PROTECT: /* Protection is only valid when there's keyframes */
00877             if (fcu->bezt)
00878                 return 1;
00879             else
00880                 return 0; // NOTE: in this special case, we need to draw ICON_ZOOMOUT
00881                 
00882         case ACHANNEL_SETTING_VISIBLE: /* Only available in Graph Editor */
00883             return (ac->spacetype==SPACE_IPO);
00884             
00885         /* always available */
00886         default:
00887             return 1;
00888     }
00889 }
00890 
00891 /* get the appropriate flag(s) for the setting when it is valid  */
00892 static int acf_fcurve_setting_flag(bAnimContext *UNUSED(ac), int setting, short *neg)
00893 {
00894     /* clear extra return data first */
00895     *neg= 0;
00896     
00897     switch (setting) {
00898         case ACHANNEL_SETTING_SELECT: /* selected */
00899             return FCURVE_SELECTED;
00900             
00901         case ACHANNEL_SETTING_MUTE: /* muted */
00902             return FCURVE_MUTED;
00903             
00904         case ACHANNEL_SETTING_PROTECT: /* protected */
00905             // *neg= 1; - if we change this to edtiability
00906             return FCURVE_PROTECTED;
00907             
00908         case ACHANNEL_SETTING_VISIBLE: /* visiblity - graph editor */
00909             return FCURVE_VISIBLE;
00910             
00911         default: /* unsupported */
00912             return 0;
00913     }
00914 }
00915 
00916 /* get pointer to the setting */
00917 static void *acf_fcurve_setting_ptr(bAnimListElem *ale, int UNUSED(setting), short *type)
00918 {
00919     FCurve *fcu= (FCurve *)ale->data;
00920     
00921     /* all flags are just in agrp->flag for now... */
00922     return GET_ACF_FLAG_PTR(fcu->flag, type);
00923 }

00992     *type= 0;
00993     
00994     switch (setting) {
00995         case ACHANNEL_SETTING_SELECT: /* selected */
00996             if (adt) {
00997                 return GET_ACF_FLAG_PTR(adt->flag, type);
00998             }
00999             else
01000                 return NULL;
01001             
01002         case ACHANNEL_SETTING_EXPAND: /* expanded */
01003             return GET_ACF_FLAG_PTR(act->flag, type);
01004         
01005         default: /* unsupported */
01006             return NULL;
01007     }
01008 }

01286             return TEX_DS_EXPAND;

01292             *neg= 1;
01293             return ADT_CURVES_NOT_VISIBLE;
01294             
01295         case ACHANNEL_SETTING_SELECT: /* selected */
01296             return ADT_UI_SELECTED;
01297

01300     }

01902 }
01903 
01904 /* offset for nodetree expanders */
01905 static short acf_dsntree_offset(bAnimContext *ac, bAnimListElem *ale)
01906 {
01907     bNodeTree *ntree = (bNodeTree *)ale->data;
01908     short offset= acf_generic_basic_offset(ac, ale);
01909     
01910     offset += acf_nodetree_rootType_offset(ntree); 
01911     
01912     return offset;
01913 }
01914

01939 
01940 /* get pointer to the setting */
01941 static void *acf_dsntree_setting_ptr(bAnimListElem *ale, int setting, short *type)
01942 {
01943     bNodeTree *ntree= (bNodeTree *)ale->data;
01944     
01945     /* clear extra return data first */
01946     *type= 0;
01947     
01948     switch (setting) {
01949         case ACHANNEL_SETTING_EXPAND: /* expanded */
01950             return GET_ACF_FLAG_PTR(ntree->flag, type);
01951             
01952         case ACHANNEL_SETTING_SELECT: /* selected */
01953         case ACHANNEL_SETTING_MUTE: /* muted (for NLA only) */
01954         case ACHANNEL_SETTING_VISIBLE: /* visible (for Graph Editor only) */
01955             if (ntree->adt)
01956                 return GET_ACF_FLAG_PTR(ntree->adt->flag, type);
01957                 else
01958                     return NULL;
01959             
01960         default: /* unsupported */
01961             return NULL;
01962     }
01963 }
01964

01967 {

01969     
01970     acf_generic_dataexpand_color,   /* backdrop color */
01971     acf_generic_dataexpand_backdrop,/* backdrop */
01972     acf_generic_indention_1,        /* indent level */
01973     acf_dsntree_offset,             /* offset */
01974     
01975     acf_generic_idblock_name,       /* name */
01976     acf_generic_idblock_nameprop,   /* name prop */
01977     acf_dsntree_icon,               /* icon */
01978     
01979     acf_generic_dataexpand_setting_valid,   /* has setting */
01980     acf_dsntree_setting_flag,               /* flag for setting */
01981     acf_dsntree_setting_ptr                 /* pointer for setting */
01982 };

02215 /* ShapeKey Entry  ------------------------------------------- */
02216 
02217 /* name for ShapeKey */
02218 static void acf_shapekey_name(bAnimListElem *ale, char *name)
02219 {
02220     KeyBlock *kb= (KeyBlock *)ale->data;
02221     
02222     /* just copy the name... */
02223     if (kb && name) {
02224         /* if the KeyBlock had a name, use it, otherwise use the index */
02225         if (kb->name[0])
02226             BLI_strncpy(name, kb->name, ANIM_CHAN_NAME_SIZE);
02227         else
02228             BLI_snprintf(name, ANIM_CHAN_NAME_SIZE, "Key %d", ale->index);
02229     }
02230 }
02231 
02232 /* name property for ShapeKey entries */
02233 static short acf_shapekey_nameprop(bAnimListElem *ale, PointerRNA *ptr, PropertyRNA **prop)
02234 {
02235     KeyBlock *kb= (KeyBlock *)ale->data;
02236     
02237     /* if the KeyBlock had a name, use it, otherwise use the index */
02238     if (kb && kb->name[0]) {
02239         RNA_pointer_create(ale->id, &RNA_ShapeKey, kb, ptr);
02240         *prop = RNA_struct_name_property(ptr->type);
02241         
02242         return (*prop != NULL);
02243     }
02244     
02245     return 0;
02246 }
02247 
02248 /* check if some setting exists for this channel */
02249 static short acf_shapekey_setting_valid(bAnimContext *UNUSED(ac), bAnimListElem *UNUSED(ale), int setting)
02250 {
02251     switch (setting) {
02252         case ACHANNEL_SETTING_SELECT: /* selected */
02253         case ACHANNEL_SETTING_MUTE: /* muted */
02254         case ACHANNEL_SETTING_PROTECT: /* protected */
02255             return 1;
02256             
02257         /* nothing else is supported */
02258         default:
02259             return 0;
02260     }
02261 }
02262 
02263 /* get the appropriate flag(s) for the setting when it is valid  */
02264 static int acf_shapekey_setting_flag(bAnimContext *UNUSED(ac), int setting, short *neg)
02265 {
02266     /* clear extra return data first */
02267     *neg= 0;
02268     
02269     switch (setting) {
02270         case ACHANNEL_SETTING_MUTE: /* mute */
02271             return KEYBLOCK_MUTE;
02272         
02273         case ACHANNEL_SETTING_SELECT: /* selected */
02274             return KEYBLOCK_SEL;
02275         
02276         case ACHANNEL_SETTING_PROTECT: /* locked */
02277             return KEYBLOCK_LOCKED;
02278         
02279         default: /* unsupported */
02280             return 0;
02281     }
02282 }
02283 
02284 /* get pointer to the setting */
02285 static void *acf_shapekey_setting_ptr(bAnimListElem *ale, int setting, short *type)
02286 {
02287     KeyBlock *kb= (KeyBlock *)ale->data;
02288     
02289     /* clear extra return data first */
02290     *type= 0;
02291     
02292     switch (setting) {
02293         case ACHANNEL_SETTING_SELECT: /* selected */
02294         case ACHANNEL_SETTING_MUTE: /* muted */
02295         case ACHANNEL_SETTING_PROTECT: /* protected */
02296             return GET_ACF_FLAG_PTR(kb->flag, type);
02297         
02298         default: /* unsupported */
02299             return NULL;
02300     }
02301 }
02302

02311     acf_generic_basic_offset,       /* offset */

02329 }

02335 }

02337 /* check if some setting exists for this channel */
02338 static short acf_gpd_setting_valid(bAnimContext *UNUSED(ac), bAnimListElem *UNUSED(ale), int setting)
02339 {
02340     switch (setting) {
02341         /* only select and expand supported */
02342         case ACHANNEL_SETTING_SELECT:
02343         case ACHANNEL_SETTING_EXPAND:
02344             return 1;
02345             
02346         default:
02347             return 0;
02348     }
02349 }
02350 
02351 /* get the appropriate flag(s) for the setting when it is valid  */
02352 static int acf_gpd_setting_flag(bAnimContext *UNUSED(ac), int setting, short *neg)
02353 {
02354     /* clear extra return data first */
02355     *neg= 0;
02356     
02357     switch (setting) {
02358         case ACHANNEL_SETTING_SELECT: /* selected */
02359             return AGRP_SELECTED;
02360             
02361         case ACHANNEL_SETTING_EXPAND: /* expanded */
02362             return GP_DATA_EXPAND;
02363     }
02364     
02365     /* this shouldn't happen */
02366     return 0;
02367 }

02376 }

02397 /* GPencil Layer ------------------------------------------- */
02398 
02399 /* name for grease pencil layer entries */
02400 static void acf_gpl_name(bAnimListElem *ale, char *name)
02401 {
02402     bGPDlayer *gpl = (bGPDlayer *)ale->data;
02403     
02404     if (gpl && name)
02405         BLI_strncpy(name, gpl->info, ANIM_CHAN_NAME_SIZE);
02406 }
02407 
02408 /* name property for grease pencil layer entries */
02409 static short acf_gpl_name_prop(bAnimListElem *ale, PointerRNA *ptr, PropertyRNA **prop)
02410 {
02411     if (ale->data) {
02412         RNA_pointer_create(ale->id, &RNA_GPencilLayer, ale->data, ptr);
02413         *prop = RNA_struct_name_property(ptr->type);
02414         
02415         return (*prop != NULL);
02416     }
02417     
02418     return 0;
02419 }
02420 
02421 /* check if some setting exists for this channel */
02422 static short acf_gpl_setting_valid(bAnimContext *UNUSED(ac), bAnimListElem *UNUSED(ale), int setting)
02423 {
02424     switch (setting) {
02425         /* unsupported */
02426         case ACHANNEL_SETTING_EXPAND: /* gpencil layers are more like F-Curves than groups */
02427         case ACHANNEL_SETTING_VISIBLE: /* graph editor only */
02428             return 0;
02429         
02430         /* always available */
02431         default:
02432             return 1;
02433     }
02434 }
02435 
02436 /* get the appropriate flag(s) for the setting when it is valid  */
02437 static int acf_gpl_setting_flag(bAnimContext *UNUSED(ac), int setting, short *neg)
02438 {
02439     /* clear extra return data first */
02440     *neg= 0;
02441     
02442     switch (setting) {
02443         case ACHANNEL_SETTING_SELECT: /* selected */
02444             return GP_LAYER_SELECT;
02445             
02446         case ACHANNEL_SETTING_MUTE: /* muted */
02447             return GP_LAYER_HIDE;
02448             
02449         case ACHANNEL_SETTING_PROTECT: /* protected */
02450             // *neg= 1; - if we change this to edtiability
02451             return GP_LAYER_LOCKED;
02452             
02453         default: /* unsupported */
02454             return 0;
02455     }
02456 }
02457 
02458 /* get pointer to the setting */
02459 static void *acf_gpl_setting_ptr(bAnimListElem *ale, int UNUSED(setting), short *type)
02460 {
02461     bGPDlayer *gpl= (bGPDlayer *)ale->data;
02462     
02463     /* all flags are just in agrp->flag for now... */
02464     return GET_ACF_FLAG_PTR(gpl->flag, type);
02465 }
02466

02471

02473     acf_generic_channel_backdrop,   /* backdrop */

02475     acf_generic_group_offset,       /* offset */
02476

02479     NULL,                           /* icon */

02485 
02486 /* *********************************************** */
02487 /* Type Registration and General Access */
02488 
02489 /* These globals only ever get directly accessed in this file */
02490 static bAnimChannelType *animchannelTypeInfo[ANIMTYPE_NUM_TYPES];
02491 static short ACF_INIT= 1; /* when non-zero, the list needs to be updated */
02492 
02493 /* Initialize type info definitions */
02494 static void ANIM_init_channel_typeinfo_data (void)
02495 {
02496     int type= 0;
02497     
02498     /* start initializing if necessary... */
02499     if (ACF_INIT) {
02500         ACF_INIT= 0;
02501         
02502         animchannelTypeInfo[type++]= NULL;              /* None */
02503         animchannelTypeInfo[type++]= NULL;              /* AnimData */
02504         animchannelTypeInfo[type++]= NULL;              /* Special */
02505         
02506         animchannelTypeInfo[type++]= &ACF_SUMMARY;      /* Motion Summary */
02507         
02508         animchannelTypeInfo[type++]= &ACF_SCENE;        /* Scene */
02509         animchannelTypeInfo[type++]= &ACF_OBJECT;       /* Object */
02510         animchannelTypeInfo[type++]= &ACF_GROUP;        /* Group */
02511         animchannelTypeInfo[type++]= &ACF_FCURVE;       /* F-Curve */
02512         
02513         animchannelTypeInfo[type++]= &ACF_FILLACTD;     /* Object Action Expander */
02514         animchannelTypeInfo[type++]= &ACF_FILLDRIVERS;  /* Drivers Expander */
02515         
02516         animchannelTypeInfo[type++]= &ACF_DSMAT;        /* Material Channel */
02517         animchannelTypeInfo[type++]= &ACF_DSLAM;        /* Lamp Channel */
02518         animchannelTypeInfo[type++]= &ACF_DSCAM;        /* Camera Channel */
02519         animchannelTypeInfo[type++]= &ACF_DSCUR;        /* Curve Channel */
02520         animchannelTypeInfo[type++]= &ACF_DSSKEY;       /* ShapeKey Channel */
02521         animchannelTypeInfo[type++]= &ACF_DSWOR;        /* World Channel */
02522         animchannelTypeInfo[type++]= &ACF_DSNTREE;      /* NodeTree Channel */
02523         animchannelTypeInfo[type++]= &ACF_DSPART;       /* Particle Channel */
02524         animchannelTypeInfo[type++]= &ACF_DSMBALL;      /* MetaBall Channel */
02525         animchannelTypeInfo[type++]= &ACF_DSARM;        /* Armature Channel */
02526         animchannelTypeInfo[type++]= &ACF_DSMESH;       /* Mesh Channel */
02527         animchannelTypeInfo[type++]= &ACF_DSTEX;        /* Texture Channel */
02528         animchannelTypeInfo[type++]= &ACF_DSLAT;        /* Lattice Channel */
02529         animchannelTypeInfo[type++]= &ACF_DSSPK;        /* Speaker Channel */
02530         
02531         animchannelTypeInfo[type++]= &ACF_SHAPEKEY;     /* ShapeKey */
02532         
02533         animchannelTypeInfo[type++]= &ACF_GPD;          /* Grease Pencil Datablock */ 
02534         animchannelTypeInfo[type++]= &ACF_GPL;          /* Grease Pencil Layer */ 
02535         
02536             // TODO: these types still need to be implemented!!!
02537             // probably need a few extra flags for these special cases...
02538         animchannelTypeInfo[type++]= NULL;              /* NLA Track */ 
02539         animchannelTypeInfo[type++]= NULL;              /* NLA Action */ 
02540     }
02541 } 
02542 
02543 /* Get type info from given channel type */
02544 bAnimChannelType *ANIM_channel_get_typeinfo (bAnimListElem *ale)
02545 {
02546     /* santiy checks */
02547     if (ale == NULL)
02548         return NULL;
02549         
02550     /* init the typeinfo if not available yet... */
02551     ANIM_init_channel_typeinfo_data();
02552     
02553     /* check if type is in bounds... */
02554     if ((ale->type >= 0) && (ale->type < ANIMTYPE_NUM_TYPES))
02555         return animchannelTypeInfo[ale->type];
02556     else
02557         return NULL;
02558 }
02559 
02560 /* --------------------------- */
02561 
02562 /* Print debug info string for the given channel */
02563 void ANIM_channel_debug_print_info (bAnimListElem *ale, short indent_level)
02564 {
02565     bAnimChannelType *acf= ANIM_channel_get_typeinfo(ale);
02566     
02567     /* print indents */
02568     for (; indent_level > 0; indent_level--)
02569         printf("  ");
02570     
02571     /* print info */
02572     if (acf) {
02573         char name[ANIM_CHAN_NAME_SIZE]; /* hopefully this will be enough! */
02574         
02575         /* get UI name */
02576         if (acf->name)
02577             acf->name(ale, name);
02578         else
02579             BLI_strncpy(name, "<No name>", sizeof(name));
02580 
02581         /* print type name + ui name */
02582         printf("ChanType: <%s> Name: \"%s\"\n", acf->channel_type_name, name);
02583     }
02584     else if (ale)
02585         printf("ChanType: <Unknown - %d>\n", ale->type);
02586     else
02587         printf("<Invalid channel - NULL>\n");
02588 }
02589 
02590 /* --------------------------- */
02591 
02592 /* Check if some setting for a channel is enabled 
02593  * Returns: 1 = On, 0 = Off, -1 = Invalid
02594  */
02595 short ANIM_channel_setting_get (bAnimContext *ac, bAnimListElem *ale, int setting)
02596 {
02597     bAnimChannelType *acf= ANIM_channel_get_typeinfo(ale);
02598     
02599     /* 1) check that the setting exists for the current context */
02600     if ((acf) && (!acf->has_setting || acf->has_setting(ac, ale, setting))) {
02601         /* 2) get pointer to check for flag in, and the flag to check for */
02602         short negflag, ptrsize;
02603         int flag;
02604         void *ptr;
02605         
02606         flag= acf->setting_flag(ac, setting, &negflag);
02607         ptr= acf->setting_ptr(ale, setting, &ptrsize);
02608         
02609         /* check if flag is enabled */
02610         if (ptr && flag) {
02611             switch (ptrsize) {
02612                 case sizeof(int):   /* integer pointer for setting */
02613                 {
02614                     int *val= (int *)ptr;
02615                     
02616                     if (negflag)
02617                         return ((*val) & flag) == 0;
02618                     else
02619                         return ((*val) & flag) != 0;
02620                 }
02621                     break;
02622                     
02623                 case sizeof(short): /* short pointer for setting */
02624                 {
02625                     short *val= (short *)ptr;
02626                     
02627                     if (negflag)
02628                         return ((*val) & flag) == 0;
02629                     else
02630                         return ((*val) & flag) != 0;
02631                 }
02632                     break;
02633                     
02634                 case sizeof(char):  /* char pointer for setting */
02635                 {
02636                     char *val= (char *)ptr;
02637                     
02638                     if (negflag)
02639                         return ((*val) & flag) == 0;
02640                     else
02641                         return ((*val) & flag) != 0;
02642                 }
02643                     break;
02644             }
02645         }
02646     }
02647     
02648     /* not found... */
02649     return -1;
02650 }   
02651 
02652 
02653 /* quick macro for use in ANIM_channel_setting_set - set flag for setting according the mode given */
02654 #define ACF_SETTING_SET(sval, sflag, smode) \
02655     {\
02656         if (negflag) {\
02657             if (smode == ACHANNEL_SETFLAG_INVERT)   (sval) ^= (sflag); \
02658             else if (smode == ACHANNEL_SETFLAG_ADD) (sval) &= ~(sflag); \
02659             else                                    (sval) |= (sflag); \
02660         } \
02661         else {\
02662             if (smode == ACHANNEL_SETFLAG_INVERT)   (sval) ^= (sflag); \
02663             else if (smode == ACHANNEL_SETFLAG_ADD) (sval) |= (sflag); \
02664             else                                    (sval) &= ~(sflag); \
02665         }\
02666     }
02667 
02668 /* Change value of some setting for a channel 
02669  *  - setting: eAnimChannel_Settings
02670  *  - mode: eAnimChannels_SetFlag
02671  */
02672 void ANIM_channel_setting_set (bAnimContext *ac, bAnimListElem *ale, int setting, short mode)
02673 {
02674     bAnimChannelType *acf= ANIM_channel_get_typeinfo(ale);
02675     
02676     /* 1) check that the setting exists for the current context */
02677     if ((acf) && (!acf->has_setting || acf->has_setting(ac, ale, setting))) {
02678         /* 2) get pointer to check for flag in, and the flag to check for */
02679         short negflag, ptrsize;
02680         int flag;
02681         void *ptr;
02682         
02683         flag= acf->setting_flag(ac, setting, &negflag);
02684         ptr= acf->setting_ptr(ale, setting, &ptrsize);
02685         
02686         /* check if flag is enabled */
02687         if (ptr && flag) {
02688             switch (ptrsize) {
02689                 case sizeof(int):   /* integer pointer for setting */
02690                 {
02691                     int *val= (int *)ptr;
02692                     ACF_SETTING_SET(*val, flag, mode);
02693                 }
02694                     break;
02695                     
02696                 case sizeof(short): /* short pointer for setting */
02697                 {
02698                     short *val= (short *)ptr;
02699                     ACF_SETTING_SET(*val, flag, mode);
02700                 }
02701                     break;
02702                     
02703                 case sizeof(char):  /* char pointer for setting */
02704                 {
02705                     char *val= (char *)ptr;
02706                     ACF_SETTING_SET(*val, flag, mode);
02707                 }
02708                     break;
02709             }
02710         }
02711     }
02712 }
02713 
02714 /* --------------------------- */
02715 
02716 // XXX hardcoded size of icons
02717 #define ICON_WIDTH      17
02718 // XXX hardcoded width of sliders
02719 #define SLIDER_WIDTH    80
02720 // XXX hardcoded width of rename textboxes
02721 #define RENAME_TEXT_WIDTH 100
02722 
02723 /* Draw the given channel */
02724 // TODO: make this use UI controls for the buttons
02725 void ANIM_channel_draw (bAnimContext *ac, bAnimListElem *ale, float yminc, float ymaxc)
02726 {
02727     bAnimChannelType *acf= ANIM_channel_get_typeinfo(ale);
02728     View2D *v2d= &ac->ar->v2d;
02729     short selected, offset;
02730     float y, ymid, ytext;
02731     
02732     /* sanity checks - don't draw anything */
02733     if (ELEM(NULL, acf, ale))
02734         return;
02735     
02736     /* get initial offset */
02737     if (acf->get_offset)
02738         offset= acf->get_offset(ac, ale);
02739     else
02740         offset= 0;
02741         
02742     /* calculate appropriate y-coordinates for icon buttons 
02743      *  7 is hardcoded factor for half-height of icons
02744      */
02745     y= (ymaxc - yminc)/2 + yminc;
02746     ymid= y - 7;
02747     /* y-coordinates for text is only 4 down from middle */
02748     ytext= y - 4;
02749     
02750     /* check if channel is selected */
02751     if (acf->has_setting(ac, ale, ACHANNEL_SETTING_SELECT))
02752         selected= ANIM_channel_setting_get(ac, ale, ACHANNEL_SETTING_SELECT);
02753     else
02754         selected= 0;
02755         
02756     /* set blending again, as may not be set in previous step */
02757     glBlendFunc(GL_SRC_ALPHA, GL_ONE_MINUS_SRC_ALPHA);
02758     glEnable(GL_BLEND);
02759     
02760     /* step 1) draw backdrop ...........................................  */
02761     if (acf->draw_backdrop)
02762         acf->draw_backdrop(ac, ale, yminc, ymaxc);
02763         
02764     /* step 2) draw expand widget ....................................... */
02765     if (acf->has_setting(ac, ale, ACHANNEL_SETTING_EXPAND)) {
02766         /* just skip - drawn as widget now */
02767         offset += ICON_WIDTH; 
02768     }
02769         
02770     /* step 3) draw icon ............................................... */
02771     if (acf->icon) {
02772         UI_icon_draw(offset, ymid, acf->icon(ale));
02773         offset += ICON_WIDTH; 
02774     }
02775     
02776     /* turn off blending, since not needed anymore... */
02777     glDisable(GL_BLEND);
02778         
02779     /* step 4) draw special toggles  .................................
02780      *  - in Graph Editor, checkboxes for visibility in curves area
02781      *  - in NLA Editor, glowing dots for solo/not solo...
02782      */
02783     if (ac->sl) {
02784         if ((ac->spacetype == SPACE_IPO) && acf->has_setting(ac, ale, ACHANNEL_SETTING_VISIBLE)) {
02785             /* for F-Curves, draw color-preview of curve behind checkbox */
02786             if (ale->type == ANIMTYPE_FCURVE) {
02787                 FCurve *fcu= (FCurve *)ale->data;
02788                 
02789                 /* F-Curve channels need to have a special 'color code' box drawn, which is colored with whatever 
02790                  * color the curve has stored 
02791                  */
02792                 glColor3fv(fcu->color);
02793                 
02794                 /* just a solid color rect
02795                  *  hardcoded 17 pixels width is slightly wider than icon width, so that 
02796                  *  there's a slight border around it 
02797                  */
02798                 glRectf(offset, yminc, offset+17, ymaxc);
02799             }
02800             
02801             /* icon is drawn as widget now... */
02802             offset += ICON_WIDTH; 
02803         }
02804         else if ((ac->spacetype == SPACE_NLA) && acf->has_setting(ac, ale, ACHANNEL_SETTING_SOLO)) {
02805             /* just skip - drawn as widget now */
02806             offset += ICON_WIDTH; 
02807         }
02808     }
02809     
02810     /* step 5) draw name ............................................... */
02811     // TODO: when renaming, we might not want to draw this, especially if name happens to be longer than channel
02812     if (acf->name) {
02813         char name[ANIM_CHAN_NAME_SIZE]; /* hopefully this will be enough! */
02814         
02815         /* set text color */
02816         // XXX: if active, highlight differently?
02817         if (selected)
02818             UI_ThemeColor(TH_TEXT_HI);
02819         else
02820             UI_ThemeColor(TH_TEXT);
02821             
02822         /* get name */
02823         acf->name(ale, name);
02824         
02825         offset += 3;
02826         UI_DrawString(offset, ytext, name);
02827         
02828         /* draw red underline if channel is disabled */
02829         if ((ale->type == ANIMTYPE_FCURVE) && (ale->flag & FCURVE_DISABLED)) {
02830             // FIXME: replace hardcoded color here, and check on extents!
02831             glColor3f(1.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f);
02832             glLineWidth(2.0);
02833                 fdrawline((float)(offset), yminc, 
02834                           (float)(v2d->cur.xmax), yminc);
02835             glLineWidth(1.0);
02836         }
02837     }
02838     
02839     /* step 6) draw backdrops behidn mute+protection toggles + (sliders) ....................... */
02840     /* reset offset - now goes from RHS of panel */
02841     offset = 0;
02842     
02843     // TODO: when drawing sliders, make those draw instead of these toggles if not enough space
02844     
02845     if (v2d) {
02846         short draw_sliders = 0;
02847         float color[3];
02848         
02849         /* get and set backdrop color */
02850         acf->get_backdrop_color(ac, ale, color);
02851         glColor3fv(color);
02852         
02853         /* check if we need to show the sliders */
02854         if ((ac->sl) && ELEM(ac->spacetype, SPACE_ACTION, SPACE_IPO)) {
02855             switch (ac->spacetype) {
02856                 case SPACE_ACTION:
02857                 {
02858                     SpaceAction *saction= (SpaceAction *)ac->sl;
02859                     draw_sliders= (saction->flag & SACTION_SLIDERS);
02860                 }
02861                     break;
02862                 case SPACE_IPO:
02863                 {
02864                     SpaceIpo *sipo= (SpaceIpo *)ac->sl;
02865                     draw_sliders= (sipo->flag & SIPO_SLIDERS);
02866                 }
02867                     break;
02868             }
02869         }
02870         
02871         /* check if there's enough space for the toggles if the sliders are drawn too */
02872         if ( !(draw_sliders) || ((v2d->mask.xmax-v2d->mask.xmin) > ACHANNEL_BUTTON_WIDTH/2) ) {
02873             /* protect... */
02874             if (acf->has_setting(ac, ale, ACHANNEL_SETTING_PROTECT))
02875                 offset += ICON_WIDTH;
02876             /* mute... */
02877             if (acf->has_setting(ac, ale, ACHANNEL_SETTING_MUTE))
02878                 offset += ICON_WIDTH;
02879         }
02880         
02881         /* draw slider
02882          *  - even if we can draw sliders for this view, we must also check that the channel-type supports them
02883          *    (only only F-Curves really can support them for now)
02884          *  - slider should start before the toggles (if they're visible) to keep a clean line down the side
02885          */
02886         if ((draw_sliders) && ELEM(ale->type, ANIMTYPE_FCURVE, ANIMTYPE_SHAPEKEY)) {
02887             /* adjust offset */
02888             offset += SLIDER_WIDTH;
02889         }
02890         
02891         
02892         /* finally draw a backdrop rect behind these 
02893          *  - starts from the point where the first toggle/slider starts, 
02894          *  - ends past the space that might be reserved for a scroller
02895          */
02896         glRectf(v2d->cur.xmax-(float)offset, yminc, v2d->cur.xmax+EXTRA_SCROLL_PAD, ymaxc);
02897     }
02898 }
02899 
02900 /* ------------------ */
02901 
02902 /* callback for (normal) widget settings - send notifiers */
02903 static void achannel_setting_widget_cb(bContext *C, void *UNUSED(arg1), void *UNUSED(arg2))
02904 {
02905     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_ANIMATION|ND_ANIMCHAN|NA_EDITED, NULL);
02906 }
02907 
02908 /* callback for widget settings that need flushing */
02909 static void achannel_setting_flush_widget_cb(bContext *C, void *ale_npoin, void *setting_wrap)
02910 {
02911     bAnimListElem *ale_setting= (bAnimListElem *)ale_npoin;
02912     bAnimContext ac;
02913     ListBase anim_data = {NULL, NULL};
02914     int filter;
02915     int setting = GET_INT_FROM_POINTER(setting_wrap);
02916     short on = 0;
02917     
02918     /* send notifiers before doing anything else... */
02919     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_ANIMATION|ND_ANIMCHAN|NA_EDITED, NULL);
02920     
02921     /* verify animation context */
02922     if (ANIM_animdata_get_context(C, &ac) == 0)
02923         return;
02924     
02925     /* verify that we have a channel to operate on, and that it has all we need */
02926     if (ale_setting) {
02927         /* check if the setting is on... */
02928         on= ANIM_channel_setting_get(&ac, ale_setting, setting);
02929         
02930         /* on == -1 means setting not found... */
02931         if (on == -1)
02932             return;
02933     }
02934     else
02935         return;
02936     
02937     /* get all channels that can possibly be chosen - but ignore hierarchy */
02938     filter= ANIMFILTER_DATA_VISIBLE|ANIMFILTER_LIST_CHANNELS;
02939     ANIM_animdata_filter(&ac, &anim_data, filter, ac.data, ac.datatype);
02940     
02941     /* call API method to flush the setting */
02942     ANIM_flush_setting_anim_channels(&ac, &anim_data, ale_setting, setting, on);
02943     
02944     /* free temp data */
02945     BLI_freelistN(&anim_data);
02946 }
02947 
02948 /* callback for rename widgets - clear rename-in-progress */
02949 static void achannel_setting_rename_done_cb(bContext *C, void *ads_poin, void *UNUSED(arg2))
02950 {
02951     bDopeSheet *ads = (bDopeSheet *)ads_poin;
02952     
02953     /* reset rename index so that edit box disappears now that editing is done */
02954     ads->renameIndex = 0;
02955     
02956     /* send notifiers */
02957     // XXX: right notifier?
02958     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_ANIMATION|ND_ANIMCHAN|NA_RENAME, NULL);
02959 }
02960 
02961 /* callback for widget sliders - insert keyframes */
02962 static void achannel_setting_slider_cb(bContext *C, void *id_poin, void *fcu_poin)
02963 {
02964     ID *id= (ID *)id_poin;
02965     FCurve *fcu= (FCurve *)fcu_poin;
02966     
02967     ReportList *reports = CTX_wm_reports(C);
02968     Scene *scene= CTX_data_scene(C);
02969     PointerRNA id_ptr, ptr;
02970     PropertyRNA *prop;
02971     short flag=0, done=0;
02972     float cfra;
02973     
02974     /* get current frame */
02975     // NOTE: this will do for now...
02976     cfra= (float)CFRA;
02977     
02978     /* get flags for keyframing */
02979     flag = ANIM_get_keyframing_flags(scene, 1);
02980     
02981     /* get RNA pointer, and resolve the path */
02982     RNA_id_pointer_create(id, &id_ptr);
02983     
02984     /* try to resolve the path stored in the F-Curve */
02985     if (RNA_path_resolve(&id_ptr, fcu->rna_path, &ptr, &prop)) {
02986         /* set the special 'replace' flag if on a keyframe */
02987         if (fcurve_frame_has_keyframe(fcu, cfra, 0))
02988             flag |= INSERTKEY_REPLACE;
02989         
02990         /* insert a keyframe for this F-Curve */
02991         done= insert_keyframe_direct(reports, ptr, prop, fcu, cfra, flag);
02992         
02993         if (done)
02994             WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_ANIMATION|ND_ANIMCHAN|NA_EDITED, NULL);
02995     }
02996 }
02997 
02998 /* callback for shapekey widget sliders - insert keyframes */
02999 static void achannel_setting_slider_shapekey_cb(bContext *C, void *key_poin, void *kb_poin)
03000 {
03001     Key *key= (Key *)key_poin;
03002     KeyBlock *kb= (KeyBlock *)kb_poin;
03003     char *rna_path= key_get_curValue_rnaPath(key, kb);
03004     
03005     ReportList *reports = CTX_wm_reports(C);
03006     Scene *scene= CTX_data_scene(C);
03007     PointerRNA id_ptr, ptr;
03008     PropertyRNA *prop;
03009     short flag=0, done=0;
03010     float cfra;
03011     
03012     /* get current frame */
03013     // NOTE: this will do for now...
03014     cfra= (float)CFRA;
03015     
03016     /* get flags for keyframing */
03017     flag = ANIM_get_keyframing_flags(scene, 1);
03018     
03019     /* get RNA pointer, and resolve the path */
03020     RNA_id_pointer_create((ID *)key, &id_ptr);
03021     
03022     /* try to resolve the path stored in the F-Curve */
03023     if (RNA_path_resolve(&id_ptr, rna_path, &ptr, &prop)) {
03024         /* find or create new F-Curve */
03025         // XXX is the group name for this ok?
03026         bAction *act= verify_adt_action((ID *)key, 1);
03027         FCurve *fcu= verify_fcurve(act, NULL, rna_path, 0, 1);
03028         
03029         /* set the special 'replace' flag if on a keyframe */
03030         if (fcurve_frame_has_keyframe(fcu, cfra, 0))
03031             flag |= INSERTKEY_REPLACE;
03032         
03033         /* insert a keyframe for this F-Curve */
03034         done= insert_keyframe_direct(reports, ptr, prop, fcu, cfra, flag);
03035         
03036         if (done)
03037             WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_ANIMATION|ND_ANIMCHAN|NA_EDITED, NULL);
03038     }
03039     
03040     /* free the path */
03041     if (rna_path)
03042         MEM_freeN(rna_path);
03043 }
03044 
03045 /* Draw a widget for some setting */
03046 static void draw_setting_widget (bAnimContext *ac, bAnimListElem *ale, bAnimChannelType *acf, uiBlock *block, int xpos, int ypos, int setting)
03047 {
03048     short negflag, ptrsize /* , enabled */ /* UNUSED */, butType;
03049     int flag, icon;
03050     void *ptr;
03051     const char *tooltip;
03052     uiBut *but = NULL;
03053     
03054     /* get the flag and the pointer to that flag */
03055     flag= acf->setting_flag(ac, setting, &negflag);
03056     ptr= acf->setting_ptr(ale, setting, &ptrsize);
03057     /* enabled= ANIM_channel_setting_get(ac, ale, setting); */ /* UNUSED */
03058     
03059     /* get the base icon for the setting */
03060     switch (setting) {
03061         case ACHANNEL_SETTING_VISIBLE:  /* visibility eyes */
03062             //icon= ((enabled)? ICON_VISIBLE_IPO_ON : ICON_VISIBLE_IPO_OFF);
03063             icon= ICON_VISIBLE_IPO_OFF;
03064             
03065             if (ale->type == ANIMTYPE_FCURVE)
03066                 tooltip= "Channel is visible in Graph Editor for editing";
03067             else
03068                 tooltip= "Channel(s) are visible in Graph Editor for editing";
03069             break;
03070             
03071         case ACHANNEL_SETTING_EXPAND: /* expanded triangle */
03072             //icon= ((enabled)? ICON_TRIA_DOWN : ICON_TRIA_RIGHT);
03073             icon= ICON_TRIA_RIGHT;
03074             tooltip= "Make channels grouped under this channel visible";
03075             break;
03076             
03077         case ACHANNEL_SETTING_SOLO: /* NLA Tracks only */
03078             //icon= ((enabled)? ICON_LAYER_ACTIVE : ICON_LAYER_USED);
03079             icon= ICON_LAYER_USED;
03080             tooltip= "NLA Track is the only one evaluated for the AnimData block it belongs to";
03081             break;
03082         
03083         /* --- */
03084         
03085         case ACHANNEL_SETTING_PROTECT: /* protected lock */
03086             // TODO: what about when there's no protect needed?
03087             //icon= ((enabled)? ICON_LOCKED : ICON_UNLOCKED);
03088             icon= ICON_UNLOCKED;
03089             tooltip= "Editability of keyframes for this channel";
03090             break;
03091             
03092         case ACHANNEL_SETTING_MUTE: /* muted speaker */
03093             //icon= ((enabled)? ICON_MUTE_IPO_ON : ICON_MUTE_IPO_OFF);
03094             icon= ICON_MUTE_IPO_OFF;
03095             
03096             if (ale->type == ALE_FCURVE) 
03097                 tooltip= "Does F-Curve contribute to result";
03098             else
03099                 tooltip= "Do channels contribute to result";
03100             break;
03101             
03102         default:
03103             tooltip= NULL;
03104             icon= 0;
03105             break;
03106     }
03107     
03108     /* type of button */
03109     if (negflag)
03110         butType= ICONTOGN;
03111     else
03112         butType= ICONTOG;
03113     
03114     /* draw button for setting */
03115     if (ptr && flag) {
03116         switch (ptrsize) {
03117             case sizeof(int):   /* integer pointer for setting */
03118                 but = uiDefIconButBitI(block, butType, flag, 0, icon, 
03119                         xpos, ypos, ICON_WIDTH, ICON_WIDTH, ptr, 0, 0, 0, 0, tooltip);
03120                 break;
03121                 
03122             case sizeof(short): /* short pointer for setting */
03123                 but = uiDefIconButBitS(block, butType, flag, 0, icon, 
03124                         xpos, ypos, ICON_WIDTH, ICON_WIDTH, ptr, 0, 0, 0, 0, tooltip);
03125                 break;
03126                 
03127             case sizeof(char):  /* char pointer for setting */
03128                 but = uiDefIconButBitC(block, butType, flag, 0, icon, 
03129                         xpos, ypos, ICON_WIDTH, ICON_WIDTH, ptr, 0, 0, 0, 0, tooltip);
03130                 break;
03131         }
03132         
03133         /* set call to send relevant notifiers and/or perform type-specific updates */
03134         if (but) {
03135             switch (setting) {
03136                 /* settings needing flushing up/down hierarchy  */
03137                 case ACHANNEL_SETTING_VISIBLE: /* Graph Editor - 'visibility' toggles */
03138                 case ACHANNEL_SETTING_PROTECT: /* General - protection flags */
03139                 case ACHANNEL_SETTING_MUTE: /* General - muting flags */
03140                     uiButSetNFunc(but, achannel_setting_flush_widget_cb, MEM_dupallocN(ale), SET_INT_IN_POINTER(setting));
03141                     break;
03142                     
03143                 /* no flushing */
03144                 case ACHANNEL_SETTING_EXPAND: /* expanding - cannot flush, otherwise all would open/close at once */
03145                 default:
03146                     uiButSetFunc(but, achannel_setting_widget_cb, NULL, NULL);
03147             }
03148         }
03149     }
03150 }
03151 
03152 /* Draw UI widgets the given channel */
03153 void ANIM_channel_draw_widgets (bContext *C, bAnimContext *ac, bAnimListElem *ale, uiBlock *block, float yminc, float ymaxc, size_t channel_index)
03154 {
03155     bAnimChannelType *acf= ANIM_channel_get_typeinfo(ale);
03156     View2D *v2d= &ac->ar->v2d;
03157     float y, ymid/*, ytext*/;
03158     short offset;
03159     
03160     /* sanity checks - don't draw anything */
03161     if (ELEM3(NULL, acf, ale, block))
03162         return;
03163     
03164     /* get initial offset */
03165     if (acf->get_offset)
03166         offset= acf->get_offset(ac, ale);
03167     else
03168         offset= 0;
03169         
03170     /* calculate appropriate y-coordinates for icon buttons 
03171      *  7 is hardcoded factor for half-height of icons
03172      */
03173     y= (ymaxc - yminc)/2 + yminc;
03174     ymid= y - 7;
03175     /* y-coordinates for text is only 4 down from middle */
03176     /* ytext= y - 4; */
03177     
03178     /* no button backdrop behind icons */
03179     uiBlockSetEmboss(block, UI_EMBOSSN);
03180     
03181     /* step 1) draw expand widget ....................................... */
03182     if (acf->has_setting(ac, ale, ACHANNEL_SETTING_EXPAND)) {
03183         draw_setting_widget(ac, ale, acf, block, offset, ymid, ACHANNEL_SETTING_EXPAND);
03184         offset += ICON_WIDTH; 
03185     }
03186         
03187     /* step 2) draw icon ............................................... */
03188     if (acf->icon) {
03189         /* icon is not drawn here (not a widget) */
03190         offset += ICON_WIDTH; 
03191     }
03192         
03193     /* step 3) draw special toggles  .................................
03194      *  - in Graph Editor, checkboxes for visibility in curves area
03195      *  - in NLA Editor, glowing dots for solo/not solo...
03196      */
03197     if (ac->sl) {
03198         if ((ac->spacetype == SPACE_IPO) && acf->has_setting(ac, ale, ACHANNEL_SETTING_VISIBLE)) {
03199             /* visibility toggle  */
03200             draw_setting_widget(ac, ale, acf, block, offset, ymid, ACHANNEL_SETTING_VISIBLE);
03201             offset += ICON_WIDTH; 
03202         }
03203         else if ((ac->spacetype == SPACE_NLA) && acf->has_setting(ac, ale, ACHANNEL_SETTING_SOLO)) {
03204             /* 'solo' setting for NLA Tracks */
03205             draw_setting_widget(ac, ale, acf, block, offset, ymid, ACHANNEL_SETTING_SOLO);
03206             offset += ICON_WIDTH; 
03207         }
03208     }
03209     
03210     /* step 4) draw text - check if renaming widget is in use... */
03211     if (acf->name_prop && ac->ads) {
03212         float channel_height = ymaxc - yminc;
03213         
03214         /* if rename index matches, add widget for this */
03215         if (ac->ads->renameIndex == channel_index+1) {
03216             PointerRNA ptr;
03217             PropertyRNA *prop;
03218             
03219             /* draw renaming widget if we can get RNA pointer for it */
03220             if (acf->name_prop(ale, &ptr, &prop)) {
03221                 uiBut *but;
03222                 
03223                 uiBlockSetEmboss(block, UI_EMBOSS);
03224                 
03225                 but = uiDefButR(block, TEX, 1, "", offset+3, yminc, RENAME_TEXT_WIDTH, channel_height, &ptr, RNA_property_identifier(prop), -1, 0, 0, -1, -1, NULL);
03226                 uiButSetFunc(but, achannel_setting_rename_done_cb, ac->ads, NULL);
03227                 uiButActiveOnly(C, block, but);
03228                 
03229                 uiBlockSetEmboss(block, UI_EMBOSSN);
03230             }
03231         }
03232     }
03233     
03234     /* step 5) draw mute+protection toggles + (sliders) ....................... */
03235     /* reset offset - now goes from RHS of panel */
03236     offset = 0;
03237     
03238     // TODO: when drawing sliders, make those draw instead of these toggles if not enough space
03239     
03240     if (v2d) {
03241         short draw_sliders = 0;
03242         
03243         /* check if we need to show the sliders */
03244         if ((ac->sl) && ELEM(ac->spacetype, SPACE_ACTION, SPACE_IPO)) {
03245             switch (ac->spacetype) {
03246                 case SPACE_ACTION:
03247                 {
03248                     SpaceAction *saction= (SpaceAction *)ac->sl;
03249                     draw_sliders= (saction->flag & SACTION_SLIDERS);
03250                 }
03251                     break;
03252                 case SPACE_IPO:
03253                 {
03254                     SpaceIpo *sipo= (SpaceIpo *)ac->sl;
03255                     draw_sliders= (sipo->flag & SIPO_SLIDERS);
03256                 }
03257                     break;
03258             }
03259         }
03260         
03261         /* check if there's enough space for the toggles if the sliders are drawn too */
03262         if ( !(draw_sliders) || ((v2d->mask.xmax-v2d->mask.xmin) > ACHANNEL_BUTTON_WIDTH/2) ) {
03263             /* protect... */
03264             if (acf->has_setting(ac, ale, ACHANNEL_SETTING_PROTECT)) {
03265                 offset += ICON_WIDTH; 
03266                 draw_setting_widget(ac, ale, acf, block, (int)v2d->cur.xmax-offset, ymid, ACHANNEL_SETTING_PROTECT);
03267             }
03268             /* mute... */
03269             if (acf->has_setting(ac, ale, ACHANNEL_SETTING_MUTE)) {
03270                 offset += ICON_WIDTH;
03271                 draw_setting_widget(ac, ale, acf, block, (int)v2d->cur.xmax-offset, ymid, ACHANNEL_SETTING_MUTE);
03272             }
03273         }
03274         
03275         /* draw slider
03276          *  - even if we can draw sliders for this view, we must also check that the channel-type supports them
03277          *    (only only F-Curves really can support them for now)
03278          *  - to make things easier, we use RNA-autobuts for this so that changes are reflected immediately, 
03279          *    wherever they occurred. BUT, we don't use the layout engine, otherwise we'd get wrong alignment,
03280          *    and wouldn't be able to auto-keyframe...
03281          *  - slider should start before the toggles (if they're visible) to keep a clean line down the side
03282          */
03283         if ((draw_sliders) && ELEM(ale->type, ANIMTYPE_FCURVE, ANIMTYPE_SHAPEKEY)) {
03284             /* adjust offset */
03285             // TODO: make slider width dynamic, so that they can be easier to use when the view is wide enough
03286             offset += SLIDER_WIDTH;
03287             
03288             /* need backdrop behind sliders... */
03289             uiBlockSetEmboss(block, UI_EMBOSS);
03290             
03291             if (ale->id) { /* Slider using RNA Access -------------------- */
03292                 PointerRNA id_ptr, ptr;
03293                 PropertyRNA *prop;
03294                 char *rna_path = NULL;
03295                 int array_index = 0;
03296                 short free_path = 0;
03297                 
03298                 /* get destination info */
03299                 if (ale->type == ANIMTYPE_FCURVE) {
03300                     FCurve *fcu= (FCurve *)ale->data;
03301                     
03302                     rna_path= fcu->rna_path;
03303                     array_index= fcu->array_index;
03304                 }
03305                 else if (ale->type == ANIMTYPE_SHAPEKEY) {
03306                     KeyBlock *kb= (KeyBlock *)ale->data;
03307                     Key *key= (Key *)ale->id;
03308                     
03309                     rna_path= key_get_curValue_rnaPath(key, kb);
03310                     free_path= 1;
03311                 }
03312                 
03313                 /* only if RNA-Path found */
03314                 if (rna_path) {
03315                     /* get RNA pointer, and resolve the path */
03316                     RNA_id_pointer_create(ale->id, &id_ptr);
03317                     
03318                     /* try to resolve the path */
03319                     if (RNA_path_resolve(&id_ptr, rna_path, &ptr, &prop)) {
03320                         uiBut *but;
03321                         
03322                         /* create the slider button, and assign relevant callback to ensure keyframes are inserted... */
03323                         but = uiDefAutoButR(block, &ptr, prop, array_index, "", ICON_NONE, (int)v2d->cur.xmax-offset, ymid, SLIDER_WIDTH, (int)ymaxc-yminc);
03324                         
03325                         /* assign keyframing function according to slider type */
03326                         if (ale->type == ANIMTYPE_SHAPEKEY)
03327                             uiButSetFunc(but, achannel_setting_slider_shapekey_cb, ale->id, ale->data);
03328                         else
03329                             uiButSetFunc(but, achannel_setting_slider_cb, ale->id, ale->data);
03330                     }
03331                     
03332                     /* free the path if necessary */
03333                     if (free_path)
03334                         MEM_freeN(rna_path);
03335                 }
03336             }
03337             else { /* Special Slider for stuff without RNA Access ---------- */
03338                 // TODO: only implement this case when we really need it...
03339             }
03340         }
03341     }
03342 }
03343 
03344 /* *********************************************** */
